title: Greg and Colin Leave IGN to Form Kinda Funny Games
description:
Get everything early here: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here: http://www.ORIGINPC.com

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody I'm Greg Miller and I just quit my job at IGN so did I me too I didn't just kidding I did yep all the kind of funny guys have quit IGN to focus on creating content for you you supported us up until this point and now we're putting our livelihoods in your hands you built this with us and now it's time to take it even further that's why we're starting kind of funny games the only place to get our opinions on gaming this is your onstop shop for commentary on what's happening in video games today we don't report the news we interpret it with you would doing let's play series daily twitch streams and the kind of funny games cast which is the game of Greggy show but about video games but the most exciting part of all this is Colin and Greg live a daily Morning Show on Twitch all about the nerdy stuff we love and live stream to you it's Greg and I podcasting each and every day alongside you developers actors you name it it's like podcast beyond but more than just

Twitch all about the nerdy stuff we love and live stream to you it's Greg and I podcasting each and every day alongside you developers actors you name it it's like podcast beyond but more than just PlayStation each and every day okay why do another patreon well we see patreon as a subscription service it gets you our content early and it gets you more involved with it adding another set of shows to our existing patreon would make it even harder to understand what you're getting want to support the game over gregy show and all the comics and movies content we do want kind of funny support that patreon want to support kind of funny games and all the video game based content we're going to do there support that one as always everything we do will eventually be free on YouTube and podcast services like iTunes and SoundCloud this is just a way to get Early Access exclusive content and even play games with us kind of funny games is the next step for us and we hope you'll come along for the

like iTunes and SoundCloud this is just a way to get Early Access exclusive content and even play games with us kind of funny games is the next step for us and we hope you'll come along for the ride whether it's supporting us on patreon watching us on YouTube or just tweeting about us with your friends every little bit helps but money would be nice yeah we don't have jobs anymore
